Name: Rose Petalini
Ingredients: 3 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of float rose petal.
Review: Peychaud's bitters give this fragrant cocktail a delicate pink hue.
History: Adapted from a recipe discovered in 2005 at Rain in Amsterdam, The Netherlands.
Nutrition: One serving of Rose Petalini contains 168 calories
